title: Grandma's Hearth Bread
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed graphic novel illustration, 1950s retro comic book style, thick black outlines, halftone shading, vibrant colors. A cozy, rustic kitchen interior, centered on a smiling grandmother (elderly woman) with curly grey hair wearing a white apron, happily kneading a large mound of bread dough on a worn wooden countertop. In the background, a massive brick hearth oven with roaring fire. Fresh loaves cooling on a rack near a window with red gingham checkered curtains. Detailed composition showing ingredients like flour, yeast jars, and eggs scattered nearby. A small tabby cat sleeps peacefully near the hearth. Speech bubble included: 'JUST LIKE GRANDPA USED TO MAKE!'. Full upper torso shot. 9:16 aspect ratio.
negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, blurry, disfigured, poorly drawn, extra limbs, watermark, text (unless requested), worst quality, cropped, signature, poorly lit, ugly, distorted perspective, missing ingredients, modern oven
